main.name: Michael Satumba
main.bio: Hello and welcome to my personal website! My name is Michael and I am a graduate of San Francisco State University, where I received both my Bachelor's and Master's degrees in Kinesiology. In addition to my background in the health and wellness field, I also have a Graduate Certificate in Software Engineering. Throughout my academic career, I have consistently sought out opportunities to integrate my software engineering skills into my studies and research in kinesiology. As I embark on my career in software engineering, I am eager to continue applying my unique combination of technical expertise and health and wellness knowledge to create innovative solutions that make a positive impact on people's lives. Thank you for visiting my website and I hope you will continue to follow my journey as I grow and learn in my field.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to be build something cool!

education.description1: Study Abroad: City University of Hong Kong
education.description2: Study Abroad: University of Technology, Sydney, Australia

work.title: Tutor
work.description: As a computer science tutor, I have a passion for helping students learn and succeed in their studies. With a strong background in computer science and a deep understanding of the subject matter, I am able to provide personalized and effective tutoring sessions that cater to the specific needs and goals of each student. Whether you are struggling with a particular course or looking to excel in your studies, I am here to help. My approach to tutoring is hands-on and interactive, with a focus on practical applications and real-world examples. I believe that the best way to learn is by doing, and I encourage my students to ask questions and get involved in the learning process. I have experience working with students of all levels, from beginners to advanced learners, and I am skilled at breaking down complex concepts into easy-to-understand explanations. My goal is to help my students not only understand the material, but also develop a love for computer science and a lifelong desire to learn and grow.In addition to my expertise in computer science, I am also a patient and compassionate tutor who is dedicated to helping my students succeed. I look forward to working with you and helping you achieve your academic goals.

work.title: Comedy Host
work.description: As the host of Ventura Comedy Club, I am responsible for introducing and welcoming comedians to the stage, as well as keeping the show running smoothly and efficiently. With a strong presence and the ability to engage with the audience, I bring a good sense of humor and quick wit to handle any unexpected situations that may arise. In addition to hosting duties, I also have experience in booking comedians, coordinating with venue staff, and promoting the show through social media and other channels. With a background in stand-up comedy and hosting, excellent communication skills, and the ability to think on my feet, I am the ideal candidate for this exciting opportunity. If you are looking for a natural performer with a love for comedy and the ability to keep a crowd entertained, I am the host for you. So, come and join me for a night of laughter and entertainment at Ventura Comedy Club.

work.title: Researcher
work.description: As a researcher in kinesiology, my primary focus has been on studying the relationship between physical movement and overall health and wellness. In my role, I have had the opportunity to work with a variety of populations and use a range of research methodologies to gather and analyze data. Additionally, I have integrated my software engineering skills in my research position, developing and implementing fitness applications to aid in data collection and analysis. I am passionate about using my knowledge and skills to make a positive impact on the health and wellness of individuals and communities.

work.title: Student
work.description: As a student in CSC 842 Human-Computer Interaction, I have gained a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices of designing and evaluating user interfaces for a variety of contexts. Through coursework and hands-on projects, I have learned how to conduct user research, design and prototype interfaces, and evaluate the usability and effectiveness of different design solutions. I am proficient in using industry-standard tools and methods for user-centered design, including usability testing, user research, and usability evaluation techniques. In addition, I have a strong understanding of human-computer interaction theories and principles, including the role of cognition, perception, and emotions in user behavior. I am well-equipped to apply these skills in a variety of professional settings, including web and mobile design, software development, and user experience (UX) research and design.

work.company: CSC 780 Application Development for Mobile Devices
work.title: Student
work.description: As a student in CSC 780 Application Development for Mobile Devices, I have gained the skills and knowledge necessary to design and develop high-quality mobile applications using Xcode and Swift for iOS platforms. Through coursework and hands-on projects, I have learned how to design user interfaces, implement and test application functionality, and optimize performance for mobile devices using Swift and Xcode. I am proficient in using these industry-standard tools and frameworks for mobile development, and have a strong understanding of the iOS ecosystem and the unique constraints and opportunities it presents for app development. In addition, I have a strong understanding of mobile development principles, including user experience design and optimization for mobile devices. I am well-equipped to apply these skills in a variety of professional settings, including iOS app development, software engineering, and user experience design.

work.title: Student
work.description: As a student in CSC 864 Multimedia Systems, I have gained a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices of designing, implementing, and evaluating multimedia systems. Through coursework and hands-on projects, I have learned how to capture, encode, and transmit multimedia content, as well as how to design and develop interactive multimedia applications. I am proficient in using industry-standard tools and techniques for multimedia processing, including image and video processing, audio processing, and multimedia authoring. In addition, I have a strong understanding of the technical and aesthetic considerations involved in multimedia design, including the use of color, sound, and motion to engage and communicate with users. I am well-equipped to apply these skills in a variety of professional settings, including web and mobile design, multimedia production, and interactive media development.

work.company: CSC 867 Advanced Internet Application Design and Development
work.title: Student
work.description: As a student in CSC 867 Advanced Internet Application Design and Development, I have gained a deep understanding of the principles and practices of designing and developing advanced web applications. Through coursework and hands-on projects, I have learned how to design and implement scalable and secure web applications using a variety of technologies, including modern front-end frameworks, back-end frameworks, and databases. I am proficient in using industry-standard tools and techniques for web development, including agile development methodologies, version control systems, and cloud deployment platforms. In addition, I have a strong understanding of web application design principles, including user experience design, performance optimization, and security best practices. With these skills, I am well-equipped to tackle complex web development challenges and bring innovative web applications to life.

work.company: The Complete 2021 Web Development Bootcamp, Udemy
work.title: Student
work.description: As a graduate of The Complete 2021 Web Development Bootcamp on Udemy, I have gained a comprehensive understanding of the technologies and techniques required to design and develop modern web applications. Through this intensive course, I have learned how to build interactive and responsive web applications using a variety of languages, frameworks, and tools, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Bootstrap, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB. I am proficient in using industry-standard development methodologies and practices, including agile development, version control, and deployment to cloud platforms. In addition to technical skills, I have also gained a strong understanding of web development best practices, including user experience design, performance optimization, and security considerations. With these skills, I am well-equipped to tackle a wide range of web development projects and bring innovative ideas to life.

work.title: Student
work.description: As a student in CSC 848 Software Engineering, I have gained a comprehensive understanding of the principles and practices of designing and developing high-quality software systems. Through coursework and hands-on projects, I have learned how to apply a variety of software development methodologies, including agile, waterfall, and spiral, to create software products that meet customer needs and expectations. I am proficient in using industry-standard tools and techniques for software development, including programming languages, frameworks, and integrated development environments (IDEs). In addition, I have a strong understanding of software engineering principles, including design patterns, testing, and quality assurance. I am well-equipped to apply these skills in a variety of professional settings, including software development, software project management, and software testing.

work.company: CSC 317 Introduction to Web Software Development
work.title: Student
work.description: As a student in CSC 317 Introduction to Web Software Development, I have gained a solid foundation in the principles and practices of designing and developing web applications. Through coursework and hands-on projects, I have learned how to build interactive and responsive web applications using a variety of languages and frameworks, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and jQuery. I am proficient in using industry-standard tools and techniques for web development, including version control systems and cloud deployment platforms. In addition, I have a strong understanding of web development best practices, including user experience design and performance optimization. I am well-equipped to apply these skills in a variety of professional settings, including web development, front-end development, and user experience design.

testimonials.text: Helpful, approachable and very nice. We worked on trouble shooting some code and establishing a DB connection. Michael was helpful and very friendly. We made some good progress during our session. Thanks!

Awesome instruction, patient and knowledgeable. JavaScript, local storage, and timers. Also we covered her element and other functions . I would definitely recommend Michael to anyone looking for a tutor. He was knowledgeable and very patient and was very good at breaking complex ideas into simple components
Great teacher and very helpful. Very patient teacher and knows his stuff! Michael explained each line in detail and encouraged me to take the lead

Knowledgeable and patient tutor. Michael is very knowledgeable and is very helpful in teaching JavaScript. He will explain the material in a way that will make sense. I will def request his tutoring services again!

Knowledgeable & Patient tutor. Michael is a very kind and patient tutor which makes him really easy to work with. He taught me new concepts in React that I have little knowledge of and was able to break things down in a way for me to understand. Just by working with Michael, it seems he really cares about what he does and wants to share his knowledge with the community. I highly recommend anyone to get help from Michael that is willing to share his knowledge and who is very down to earth to make sure you understand the concept.

I worked with Michael on an Apache-like web server written in vanilla Java, which served a subset of the HTTP protocols. Michael proved to be an excellent team member and an astute developer. Despite the challenging task, he demonstrated his ability to adapt and make sound decisions. I found Michael to be a hard worker, a professional, and a joy to work with.

I am absolutely impressed with Mr. Satumbas work! As a small independent business owner I needed a website that encapsulated my camera and video services. He brought to life what I once could only imagine would be a perfect website for my business. The only thing that surpasses his website building skills is his fun and eager personality that makes it really easy to work with him. With Gratitude, Julian

I first met Michael through LinkedIn when I reached out to him for help with development on one of my projects: STREAMD. During his time working with me he was responsible with developing the frontend of the website using React Native and Firestore as the tech stack. Right away I was impressed with his ability to take initiative and get started on development as soon as he was able to. Within the first few days, he gave me a working prototype of the site. He demonstrated amazing ability to follow instructions but at the same time solve problems on his own when they arose. What impressed me the most about Michael is his drive to work hard. He’s not someone that will sit around and wait to be assigned problems, but instead will take care of them as he come across them. I’m confident that whatever responsibilities Michael is assigned he can get it done.

I had the pleasure of working with Michael as my personal trainer. He was able to help me develop my health and fitness goals with achievable milestones so I felt motivated by the progress. Michael has a passion to connect with people and provide solutions. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills are a great asset to any company.

I had the pleasure of working with Michael on a web application for the CSC648/848 course where his role was of a Frontend developer. Michael is an innovator with good designing skills. He is always receptive to formulating new techniques and approaches and puts all his energy and time to meet the highest standards. In many instances, he proved that he is a team player and never hesitated to provide support when needed.  He would be a trusted colleague and definitely a valuable addition to the team.

Michael is one of the select few I've worked with that has the ability to adapt to any situation. I had the pleasure to work with Michael as his Backend lead for CSC 648/848 course and I would gladly do it again. He absolutely blew our minds when he unveiled the Frontend portion of the web app. His utilization of Frontend tools such as Bootstrap, CSS/HTML, etc is truly impeccable. In addition, his charisma and communication skills along with his Software Engineering skills makes him a valuable team member.
